label13: Function of SMS to controll voice activated on or off. Send 000 SMSto turn off sound control function. Send 111 SMS to turn on sound control function
label10: Small size as a match box , portable, clear voice, long standby duration, simple operation, stable performance, and easy installation and so on
label14: Voice activated function. If the surrounding 10m voice is up to 45db , the monitor will automatically dial back to your phone
note: Right plug of adapter would be sent according to your shipping country
label8: The world's infinite distance voice transmission (using the GSM signal transmission, no distance limit can be inter-provincial cross-border)
label7: It's mainly used for home monitoring, children, old people, pet supervision monitoring, car, warehouse security tracking etc
